name: KlanZ
description:
KlanZ is a collectible cards game with the unique atmosphere and mechanics. More than 800 characters with individual stories and personalities. 20 thematic clans with unique bonuses. Create your own style of play by building cards from modules and buying boosters. Build varied decks and enjoy the intelligent combat system.

Comics-like visual style and multi-layered storyline. Endless possibilities for strategy. Friendly atmosphere and game community. And if you are tired of Hearthstone why not give a shot another card game?

Remember! The City awaits you!
